title: Swiggy Rs 570 order cost me Rs 6k, Swiggy delivery theft caught on cam
selftext:
A swiggy delivery man delivered an order and in return stole a brand new reebok shoe from outside the flat.

Link to the post- [https://twitter.com/risjain95/status/1734610529417838852?t=t5CKZY9TBbPQB\_7HHzrktQ&s=19](https://twitter.com/risjain95/status/1734610529417838852?t=t5CKZY9TBbPQB_7HHzrktQ&s=19)

Guys, please share this post and also express your views, I have reached out to swiggy and on telephonic conversations they are denying to compensate.

The person in the question is representing Swiggy and is on duty wherein he has stolen an item.

This incident happened in sector 76, please be aware and vigilant.

PS- The above link has 4 videos in case it's unclear
comments:
What happened was unfortunate. File a police complaint and provide all the details

I don't see why swiggy will compensate for this.
Swiggy will have that person's current address as well as Aadhar card copy. You can request for both through a police complaint.
